slippageDialog.high: A protection mechanism that revokes the transaction when the actual price at which the trade is executed deviates from the expected price.
result.noClose: Do not close this tab, you will automatically be directed to a confirmation page after getting a quote
tokenSearchTip: Search token by name or address
swapResults.label: Estimated Processing Time: {time} min
swapResults.tip: Bridging in process. Track the status of your transaction on the <a id='history-page'>history page<a/>.
recommendContent:
1. Referring 3 people earns you a 10% commission; referring 10 people yields a 30% commission; referring 50 people unlocks a maximum 50% commission.
2. Regular users (those who access without a referral code) will not accrue commission earnings.
3. Initially, commission earnings will be manually distributed monthly by the Management Committee, while later you can claim them through a contract.
contributionContent:
1. Contribution scores become effective when a referral code has at least 3 valid invitees (applies to both the referrer and the invitees).
2. Regular users (those who access without a referral code) won't earn contribution scores.
3. Contribution scores will be initially calculated in the form of UTS (Utmost Swap Score), which is non-transferable.
4. UTS will serve as a critical reference for future airdrops.
5. You will receive 1 UTS for each single-chain transaction and 10 UTS for each cross-chain transaction.
referralRuleTip: Register to obtain an exclusive referral link and share it to unlock additional benefits.
